title: How the fuck am i supposed to enjoy this game?
body:
I took a break from ranked, way too fucking stressful when preseason occurs, so I go to norms. 
Ive lost 4 NORMS, in a row.
My match history will indicate ive lost the majority of my norms. ALBEIT, I am not always doing so hot. *Cough* adcing with troll supports all the time.
But even in my main lane mid. So god damn hard. I can stomp my laner so hard, so god damn hard and it wont matter because every other lane went to shit. Don't even say "Well roam" I did, and I did all of the work too. I remember yesterday I accidentally hit ranked, my Diana jungle, I was the ONLY one who even went positive. Like I cant physically have fun in this game anymore and it sucks

replies.body:
I had a Flex game earlier today where I was mid lane.

Match up was {{champion:101}} (Me) vs {{champion:63}} 

I was doing extremely well in lane, had double his cs at one point. We were both 0/0.  My jungle {{champion:32}}  comes in and decides to tower dive the {{champion:63}} at level 3. He dies.  

He then comes back when he's level 6 but has 20% hp. He flash Q R's the brand, gets ignited under tower and dies.

Guess what happened from then on? Brand snowballed his lead and we lost.

Even though I ended 11/4/10 and had a significant CS lead it was irrelevant.



I've stopped playing ADC when my duoq support is offline.
If you cant handle losses and teams being important, then dont play PvP games - as easy as that.
